metadata.headquarters: First Assurance House, Clyde Gardens, Gitanga Road, Lavington, P.O. Box 30064-00100, Nairobi, Kenya

digital_presence.api_notes: Self-service portal for motor insurance quotes and purchases; quotation form available on website

reputation.claims_settlement_ratio: Mid-60% range (2023 IRA data); 8.71% in Q2 2025; consistent performance with testimonials for quick settlements
reputation.customer_complaints: Limited public details; some delays in processing noted on social media
reputation.customer_rating: Positive for reliability and customer-centric approach; trusted with 93 years experience; part of Absa Group
reputation.notes: Founded 1930 as Prudential; Kenyanized 1991; strong in general and health; partnerships with ICPAK for professionals; low penetration addressed via tailored products
